title: GRAB & GO CHIA YOGURT PARFAIT
directions: Spoon the yogurt into a jar. Stir in the chia seeds, any sweetener you like, and vanilla extract. Top with the fruit, and whatever you like that is crunchy. Place in the refrigerator overnight, or at least 10-15 minutes (to let the chia bloom).
ingredients: sweetener to taste (liquid stevia, maple syrup, honey, etc.)
a handful of seasonal fruit (i.e. smashed berries)
